1112.content:
Having been named the most deadly rouge ninja from Leaf village, it was no wonder many leaf ninja came after you as you travel about. Always in your way many met their death by you and your deadly ninja skills. A knife in the back or poisoned, those that escaped call you a monster, a ninja with no soul, a heartless creature.

Whatever the case this did not stop ninjas coming after you and now one night as you settle down in a forest you suddenly jump up avoid a pair of blades flying under you. You mind sharpness picks up and with that you quickly begin to make yourself an useable target. Hiding in the trees you slowly pick out your targets as they try to search for you.

Two male ninja with their faces covered and finally a female ninja with long blonde hair in a pony tail, a purple ninja suit, black sandals and ocean blue eyes. Your targets are nothing special as you quickly realise by knocking out the first one by bending back a tree branch. The other two stay hidden hoping you would come out to finish their friend but instead you used this chance to sneak up on the second male ninja who hid in another tree. You choke him out leaving him to fall to the floor before finally moving on to your final target.

This ninja shows a lot more class then her fellow ninjas. Being about to detect you and even manage to cut you on your left cheek with one of her blades as she tries to keep her distance. However you restlessly continue to pursue her until finally with a tackle you manage to grab the female ninja sending you both tumbling to the forest grass covered ground. Another scuffle begins between you two till finally you both begin to take on each other in one on one combat.

You can a few blows from her across your face and chest, however you land a lot more powerful punches and kicks to the female ninja leaving her weak and wobbly it doesn't take much for you to trick her and end up with your small blade at her throat.

"Tell me your name ninja?" you ask watch as the female ninja eyes look at the blade tip nearly digging into her skin.

"I don't need to tell you nothing." she angrily says back. With this you force the knife closer to her neck saying to her.

"My somebody does not accept defeat easy. Still your not worth killing so perhaps you could be useful for other matters huh?"

At this the female ninja tries to run but jumping on her, you wrestle with her until finally you place a white cloth over her mouth. She let's out a muffled growl as she twists and turns, trying to throw you off, but you held firm. Bit by bit, you see the young woman's eyes start to flutter as her body began to take full breaths of the drug. After a minute or two, you feel her body go limp in your grasp. Releasing her, you turn her over onto her back, where she lay spread eagle on the ground. Now what do you do with Ino?

1131.content:
Even the greatest minds miss things. Such was the case when you, a strange little Arrancar managed to slip out of Los Nochas unnoticed and unmissed after Aizen's failure allowed the Soul Reapers to take temporary control of the once great Hollow strong hold. And when it was clear things were getting hairy for the likes of you, you followed your instincts, grabbed a spare Gigai and escaped to the world of the living.

You are not the strongest Arrancar. Strong enough for most Soul Reapers and Hollows and even the Vice-Captain and Adjuchas. The Captains, Vasto Lordes, and that Ichigo brat were all things to stay out of the way of. But, fighting isn't what you're best at. No. You have special powers, ones that make you difficult to find and even harder to fight. In your unreleased state you could reduce your body size to that of an insect to avoid detection and make your spirit pressure almost nonexistent. This made it easy to feed, just quietly swoop down and take a bite out of someone. Thus devour a small part of their spirit that they'll never miss, part of the body for Soul Reapers and Hollows, and drinking the blood of humans. Easy, mostly clean and best of all undetectable.

Now, when you released your sword, the same as above applies, but with a bonus. In your released form, just a pair of insect wings and a thin blade like hollow needle coming out of your right arm, you can capture your prey. With one prick from your needle you inject a venom made from your own spirit power that attacks the host's mind, softly. They become very susceptible to your suggestions. The second sting puts them into a dream like state where they will be unable to take any action against you and be completely at your mercy. What an evil little bug you are...:)



You walked down the street in your Gigai. This place, Karakura Town as it was called, interested you. It was the place Aizen had attacked and failed at. You weren't sorry he was gone. Worked too hard to stir everything up, it was annoying. But at the time you had to act like a good little Arrancar and not disobey. That was behind you now. Now there was a little unfinished business in this town for you to take care of. And with that Ichigo kid out of the way and both Soul Society and Hueco Mundo recovering after the war now was the best time to have some fun with a little 'princess' that everyone made such a fuss over.

"Now, where is she?" You said looking around the grounds of a small apartment complex. "Information said she lives in one of those apartments. So, where-"

"Goodbye Tatsuki. Thanks again for the dinner."

You smile to yourself and look over at the young red haired girl walked to the apartment as she waved at her friend, a black haired girl of the same age, who headed off down a different street. You begin walking passed her and just smile pleasantly as she turns to you. It was her, Orihime Inoue.

"Nice evenings, isn't it?" You say friendly like.

She returns the smile as you pass her. "Yes. Have a good night."

"You too, miss." And you tip your hat to her.

You both walk off but you watch her carefully as you turn the corner. She climbs the stairs and walks into her apartment. Your friendly smile turn sadistic as you head for home. "This will be fun."


Later that night...

Orihime slept peacefully in her futon, completely relax after the defeat of Aizen. If she'd not let her guard down she may had noticed the small white dot fly into her room through the open window. But now...it was too late.

You hover over her quietly, not sound to be made. With glee you watched your new prey slumber all cozy in her bed, unaware of the 1/2 inch hollow who's soon call her servant. It was existing to be this close to tainting the one who caused so much trouble to start a war.

You unsheathed your zanpakutō and held the blade against your neck and spoke the release.

"Beso, Parásito."

In a small puff of smoke you were changed. You had incest wings and the stinger needle on your right arm. You slowly descended to your waiting victim and landed softly on her nose. Orihime's entire unprotected body was now yours for the taking. What to do first?
1131.title: Kiss, Parasite.

The giant mechanical beast tore through the smashed bus, launching at Raven before being diverted by a combined assault from Cyborg and Robin. As the beast turned, the long tail swung around and smashed into Raven, sending her flying through a storefront. None of the other Titans were able to free themselves from the fight for long enough to check on Raven. This meant that the chance you had been waiting for had finally come. Slipping through the smashed glass, you followed the trail of destruction and found Raven slumped in a smashed display. She was obviously groggy but quickly coming around, so you had to act fast.

After a few gestures and quiet words in a language that few had heard in millennia, you pressed your hand to Raven’s forehead around the gem there. An electric tingle briefly jolted through your fingers and the groggy young woman in your grasp stiffed for a moment before lapsing into complete unconsciousness. With another spell, you released a stream of black flames that curled through the air before resolving into a whirling vortex. With great care, you scooped up Raven and walked towards your portal. Sparing a moment, you looked back over your shoulder and saw the still ongoing fight outside, though it appeared to be quickly drawing to a close. As you stepped through, the flames closed in sealing the breach in your wake just as the other Titans started to call Raven’s name.

After the other end of the portal shut behind you just the same, you laid Raven down before summoning more streams of black flames that tightened around the young woman’s body to keep her immobile and lifted her to float in mid air. Stepping up close to her, you took another moment to savor the lovely woman before you. Running your fingers down across her smooth skin, you felt the muscles beneath. Slipping her cloak off, you tossed it aside, leaving her in just her tight fitting leotard and belt. Hooking your hand behind her head, you buried your face in her hair, and found that there was a surprising light floral scent. You hadn’t quiet been expecting that from her, but it was pleasant nonetheless.

Regretfully, you pulled away from Raven – though not before stealing a kiss from her – as you had plans for her.

121211.content:
You were quickly able to get all of the ingredients together since you had been waiting for this very moment for quite a while. There was just one more thing you needed as you mixed most of it in a chalice. With a flick of your fingers, the bands holding Raven rotated her to horizontal. With a quiet apology you pricked one of her fingers with a dagger, squeezing out several drops of her blood into the mixture. With unconscious, she squirmed and groaned as you did so. With another gesture, she was rotated back to vertical as you put the finishing touches on ritual.

As you were stirring the last ingredient in, you saw something out of the corner of your eye.

“I wouldn’t do that if I were you,” you cautioned as you glanced back over your shoulder.

Raven was now conscious, but not quite fully collected as she strained to telekinetically grasp one of the items on your work table. She froze for a moment before continuing. With a sigh, you let her carry on till she let out a scream as the bands sent a shock through her body. Turning around, you watched the darkness that was a sign of her powers fade from the crucible that she had likely been trying to throw at your head. With Raven pacified again, you returned your attention to the ritual. A smile spread across your face as the mix turned black as tar and slightly foamy.

Turning around, you let her get a good look at the chalice.

“Do you expect me to drink that?” she said almost entirely monotone, but you could tell there was a hint of something beneath the veneer. Was that fear perhaps?

“No, I don’t,” you admitted, “It’s for me.”

And with that you upended the entire thing, drinking deep and trying to ignore the vile taste. As the last drop slithered down your throat, you felt a chill shoot through your body. Raven had been watching with a horrified look on her face, but obviously felt something similar at the same time. Setting the chalice aside, you stifled a burp that brought some of the taste back, and gave one sharp clap that caused the black bands holding her to vanish dropping her to the ground.

“You’re free to go,” you said, waving to a door and turning your back on her.

Even without looking, you could almost see the expression on her face and the thoughts whirling through her head: what was all this about, was she really getting let go so easily, should she attack you anyways? After several more moments she seemed to decide that discretion was the better part of valor and gathered up her discarded cloak before making for the door.

She was almost there when you chimed in, “On second thought, stop.”

A quick glance over your shoulder showed that she had indeed stopped cold, her hand almost touching the door, but it may as well been a thousand miles away.

“Come back here,” you commanded next as you turned around and pointed at a spot on the floor right in front of you.

She turned on her heel and marched back to you, though you could see on her face that she was trying her best to not follow your command and was very concerned that she couldn’t. Once she was in front of you, you tenderly placed your hand under her chin and pushed her up to look in your face. She tried to pull away, but you told her to hold still and she promptly did so.

“Oh, we’re going to have a lot of fun,” you whispered as you locked eyes with her and watched the slight tremble that still passed through her slender body.

Pulling out a box, you opened it before her revealing a…
1212111.title: Falling into place

choices: “Of course, I know who you are, master.”

121212.content:
Forcing her to do your bidding wasn’t enough; she had to be utterly yours. Anything else wouldn’t do at all. You had been preparing for this moment since the first time you saw the young woman. Tracking down all the ingredients was difficult and expensive, but it would all be worth it when this was over.

Some of the materials went into a simmering cauldron, while you ground up the rest with a mortar and pestle. Raven struggled against her bonds even while unconscious as you applied the fine powder to her forehead. Using her gem as a focus, you drew the required symbol with quick yet careful motions. Turning back to the cauldron, you dumped the remains of the powder in to finish the latest step. The thick liquid within roiled, moving almost as if it was alive. You performed a few quick arcane gestures to subdue the aggressive reaction.

After the mixture had settled at least a bit, you picked up a ceremonial dagger you had prepared earlier. You hissed a bit as you pricked a finger, letting a few drops of blood well up and collect on the blade. Turning to Raven, you went around her head and pulled one of her hands out and repeated the step with her. She moaned, but that was her only reaction because of your spell over her. Returning to the mixture, you let the mingling blood drip into the cauldron. The reaction was even more violent this time; the cauldron shaking as it almost leapt from the table. You struggled to maintain control, but bit by bit, the motions slowed till they stopped.

Wiping a bead of sweat that hung to your forehead, you passed a finger down over the worn and tattered page. Satisfied that you hadn’t missed anything, you started the incantation. Again and again you chanted, adding ever more complex gestures and hand signs. The dark brew oozed up and out of the vessel, forming a growing cloud of inky darkness in midair. Continuing the spell, you watched as the potion started drifting over till it was hovering straight over Raven.

You couldn’t help letting a grin cross your face. All the preparation and hard work was about to pay off at last.

You switched to the last part of the chant and slashed a finger down through the air towards Raven. The black ooze hung in mid-air for another second before a tendril of it lashed out to plunge between her lips. Her eyes snapped open, going wide in fright. She tried to scream, but the thickness filling her throat prevented that. You saw a flicker of a glow in her eyes as she tried to access her powers, but it was for naught as the mixture continued to force down her throat.

The last of the mixture slipped down into her. Her throat freed, she gasped and looked to be getting ready to scream. Instead, she ground her teeth together as every muscle in her body spasmed. Her back arched high, pulling her arms and legs against the magical bonds holding them. She groaned loudly and screwed her eyes shut before slumping to hang slack again.

After several seconds of nothing happening, you tried speaking to her. “Raven dear, are you alright?”

At first, she didn’t seem to respond. Then her eyelids fluttered and opened bit by bit. Her eyes shifted around but didn’t seem to focus on anything. You were about to check out the spell again, thinking you must have missed something, but her eyes came to rest on you and a small smile curled her lips.

“Yes, I’m fine,” she said, her voice soft.

Things seemed to be going fine now, so it was time for the real test. “Raven, do you know who I am?”

She paused, nibbling on her lip. Then her eyes went wide.
121212.title: Puppet

12123.content:
Hastily, you take out a thick piece of cloth from your back-pocket and rush to the downed superheroine's location. Once in front of her, you bend down to grab a hold of the front of her cloak and haul her out of the display she slammed into; only to spin around and slam her on the floor, though carefully enough to avoid harming her.

You notice how the sudden jostling seems to snap her mind back into focus, but before she can react, you move to position yourself on top of her; straddling her body and making sure both her arms get pinned under you. Her gorgeous violet eyes look at you in shock for barely a split-second before they narrow dangerously and start glowing with power. Loud and clear, even with her mysterious monotone voice, she speaks up in ire and indignation.

"Just what the HELL do you think you ar-MPH!"

Quick as a cat, you use her speech to your advantage and stuff the cloth into her open mouth until it appropriately muffles her words. The bold action breaks her focus momentarily and her orbs' ominous white glow fades; allowing you to relish the stunned look she sends your way.

Now, you know you're not out of the woods yet; impairing her speech may take care of the huge power discharge that comes from her mantra, but it doesn't neutralize the rest of her magic once she manages to regain her wits. So with that in mind, you reach behind you into your other back-pocket and pull out a black leather collar with a garnet clasp at the front that, for anyone else, appeared to be ordinary. However, if one was to take a look at its inner walls, they'd see an array of intricate foreign symbols that most certainly weren't; and if that someone were to be sufficiently adept in matters of the arcane, they would not only recognize the band's peculiarity...but actually be wary of it.

Vulgarly known as a 'Band of lethargy', the unassuming strip of leather was a crafty magical artifact commonly used by bountyhunters who specialized in targets with an affinity for mystical energies. It was designed to not only restrain the wearer's power, but also drain their energy to the point of physical inutility. What was best, it actually used the siphoned magic to apply a protection spell onto itself, so the collar wouldn't be easily ripped off, as well as a locking spell upon the jeweled clasp that could only be broken by a second party with high understanding of arcane arts; both of which became stronger depending on the potency of the wearer's magical power.

Truly quite a nifty tool to have on hand.

Raven's intelligent orbs regard the object for a brief moment before widening in alarm as she quickly connects the dots. Nevertheless it is for naught, as your agile hands swiftly surge towards her neck and strap the band around it before her dark energy can even manifest. You smirk victoriously as the half-demoness' dread filled eyes are rapidly overcome by an unnatural tiredness and she goes limp beneath you with a defeated groan.

Unwilling to let your triumph go underestimated, you boldly move your hands to firmly grab both of her fully developed, exquisitely sized breasts (seriously, between the cloak around her body 24/7 and how minor her growth-spurt ended up being it was easy to forget she's now eighteen!) and begin to fondle them tenderly. "You and I are going to have so much fun, Rae-Rae" You gloat, chuckling in amusement when her tired looking eyes narrow and flicker with hatred.

Acknowledging you most likely don't have a lot of time before the rest of the Titans start to wonder about their missing teammate and send someone to check on her, you finish your ministrations with an appreciative squeeze and start enacting your withdrawal from the scene.

Locating a conveniently nearby roll of duct tape, you reach for it and rip several strips off to secure the cloth inside the young woman's mouth. Naturally she tries to resist, but in her current shape it was glaringly futile. Once that was done, you rise from her vulnerable form and begin searching through the various inner pockets of her cloak. It doesn't take more than a minute for you to find her communicator, which you nonchalantly throw away into the debris; though not before placing a previously prepared sticky note on it with a taunting message that read 'Borrowed your hot friend. I'll return her later...maybe'.

Your dark damsel groans pitifully once again when she sees you discard her distress signal and your smirk grows as she sluggishly tries to rip the tape off.

Deeming your purpose to stay officially fulfilled, you crouch in order to pick up the captive sorceress and calmly throw her over your shoulder; standing back up is a little harder than you imagined, but nothing you can't handle. Lifting your free arm, an ornate silver ring resting on your finger begins to glow with blue light and, in response, a portal big enough for you to walk through forms in front of you.

"This is it, my lovely dark angel. Aren't you excited?" You question, mockingly eager while teasingly caressing her smooth and soft thighs. She responds with a negative sounding moan as her legs give a weak jerk and her fist pretty much taps against your back "Heheh, yeah I assumed so"

On the other side of the portal is your very own magical sanctum; a pocket-dimension you created through a combination of rituals and powerful arcane artifacts. Within it almost no one can defy you and all magical abilities besides yours are rendered moot.

The large interior is almost barren when you and your guest step inside, although you can change that with a snap of your fingers; with nothing but a big, comfortable looking four poster bed at the center and two small tables with various kinky tools on top resting a couple of feet away. Nice and simple.

Not wanting to waste a second, you swiftly move in the bed's direction and promptly lay her down upon the soft mattress. A confused noise leaves her at your actions, before it quickly changes into a subdued cry of rage as you get onto the bed with her, undo the clasp of her cloak, and strip her from it; leaving the gray heroine to flush in embarrassment and anger now that her vulnerable body is clad in just her tight-fitting leotard, boots, and jeweled belt. Humming contently at the reveal of her shapely legs and her sexy derriere you proceed to straddle her soft but strong thighs and start to massage it.

If ya ask me, such a waste should be a crime!" This statement you make stick by giving a swift smack to her left asscheek; causing her breathing to hitch at the sting.

Doing your best not to be too entranced by the jiggling of her assaulted rump, you lift your right hand and command a small syringe with fluorescent pink liquid inside to appear in its grasp.

Fortunately, I've never claimed to be all there heheh" You say, trying to sound ominous as you use your free hand to push aside half of the leotard's backside; fully exposing her right gluteus, much to her already acute mortification "So you can bet I WILL...discipline you. But first!" Without warning, you stick the needle into her soft flesh and plunge its contents into her system; actually managing to rip a sort of loud shriek of pained shock from her gagged lips "A little cocktail of my own design to insure BOTH of us enjoy this, if you catch my drift" You explain cockily, snickering in amusement when the empath moans mournfully as the fact you just infused her with an aphrodisiac fully registers in her sharp mind. While you can't see it, imagining her horrified expression works almost as well to send a thrill up your spine.

Once again you stare at her amazing form for a little while; long enough to hear her first grunt of discomfort and witness how she starts to squirm weakly on the mattress.

It won't be long until every nerve in her body is sensitized beyond her wildest wet dreams and your every attention tries her fortitude.
